column4: I need to automate a task where I daily copy some 500 files from some 50 different directories to a remote FTP server.. Im looking at the ftp command but I don't see how I can automate that (like specifying the user name, password, etc).. How could I automate this task?
the ftp command does not have any syntax to automate entering of passwords and commands
Perhaps you may want to look at rsync instead
You may find some bash scripts to modify for that purpose here http://www.reallylinux.com/docs/autoftp.shtml
